commentaries.bbcode: [b]Duminy: [/b]"We were outplayed tonight. We had a pretty dreadful start with the bat that put us on the back foot. I still thought it was a defendable total. We didn't put the ball in the right areas, and we know we were well below par today. It's a long way to go, and we know we have a few things to work on."

message.text: Duminy: "We were outplayed tonight. We had a pretty dreadful start with the bat that put us on the back foot. I still thought it was a defendable total. We didn't put the ball in the right areas, and we know we were well below par today. It's a long way to go, and we know we have a few things to work on."

commentaries.bbcode: [b]Gambhir: [/b]"I think a lot of credit goes to the bowlers. It was a fantastic effort. That last over by Umesh gave us some momentum. I think it was a case of rotating the bowlers to keep the batsmen guessing. I think no-one knew how the wicket was going to play. We were confident of chasing. My form doesn't matter; all that matters is the number of points we have as a team. I am very happy, and will ensure our team don't get complacent."

message.text: Gambhir: "I think a lot of credit goes to the bowlers. It was a fantastic effort. That last over by Umesh gave us some momentum. I think it was a case of rotating the bowlers to keep the batsmen guessing. I think no-one knew how the wicket was going to play. We were confident of chasing. My form doesn't matter; all that matters is the number of points we have as a team. I am very happy, and will ensure our team don't get complacent."

tweetjson.text: The maturity shown by Yusuf Pathan in his last two innings adds another dimension to #KKR's already multi-faceted team. #IPL #DDvKKR #DD

user.name: Freddie Wilde
user.description: Cricket journalist @ESPNcricinfo & others. Researcher @DOAGfilm. Live-Tweeting global cricket. The home of T20 cricket news on Twitter. #IPLFantasy: 17028. #IPL

message.text:
The maturity shown by Yusuf Pathan in his last two innings adds another dimension to #KKR's already multi-faceted team. #IPL #DDvKKR #DD

— Freddie Wilde (@fwildecricket) April 20, 2015

commentaries.bbcode: A classically clinical display by KKR has kept their momentum going. For DD, the wait for a home win goes on, and this passionate crowd definitely deserves reward soon. Thanks very much for your company today, and we've got a cracker of a match tomorrow, where the unbeaten RR play host to the wounded star-studded team that is KXIP.

message.text: A classically clinical display by KKR has kept their momentum going. For DD, the wait for a home win goes on, and this passionate crowd definitely deserves reward soon. Thanks very much for your company today, and we've got a cracker of a match tomorrow, where the unbeaten RR play host to the wounded star-studded team that is KXIP.
